snippet.title: One Piece: Unlimited World Red - Battle Coliseum Trailer
snippet.description:
Stand up against the villainous pirate The Red Count!

One Piece: Unlimited World Red will be available July 8, 2014 in the Americas on PlayStation 3, PlayStation Vita, Nintendo 3DS, and Wii U!

Check out all the details on the Limited Day One Edition here: http://bit.ly/1oTmVuU

Get One Piece Updates and Join the Bandai Namco Community!
Tumblr: http://bandainamcous.tumblr.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS/
